程序包 edu.ftp.client

接口 StreamLogging

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ControlSocket, DataSocket, FTPClientHandler, FTPClientImpl, FTPPath
    public interface StreamLogging
    Stream Logger for all implemented classes. Using ConsoleHandler by default.

    • 字段概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • addLogPublisher

        static void addLogPublisher​(StreamLoggingPublisher streamLoggingPublisher)
        Add publisher for StreamLogging interface. If you simply want to log in console with prefix, try 
        
 StreamLogging.addLogPublisher((String record)->{
      System.out.println("MyLog: " + record);
 });
        or the old-fashioned way, 
        
 StreamLogging.addLogPublisher(new StreamLoggingPublisher(){
      @Override
      void publish(String logRecord){
          System.out.println("MyLog: " + record);
      }
 });
        参数:
        streamLoggingPublisher - Publisher for logs.
        另请参阅:
        StreamLoggingPublisher
